extDesc.message: A web extension to save, manage and restore sessions and tabs.

generalPage.description: The label for the General page in settings

keyboardShortcutsPage.description: The label for the Keyboard Shortcuts page in settings

aboutPage.description: The label for the About page in settings

aboutDonateHeading.description: The heading used in the donate modal

aboutDonateText.message: Sessionic is free forever without ads, bloat or tracking. It takes a lot of my time in development. If you woud like to help me improve the extension, please consider donating using the links below
aboutDonateText.description: The paragrah used in the donate modal and the about page

labelUnnamedSession.description: The label for Unnamed Session when saving without naming a session

labelMinute.description: The label for minute (abbreviated if possible)

*://*/*
file:///*/*
ftp://*/*
chrome://*/*
https://*.google.com/
https://www.youtube.com/*
